title: Which site would you recommend to use for proofreading service? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can find hundreds of sites that offer proofreading services. But apart from the rates, you must choose a site that is reliable and actually has a team of capable editors. From my personal experience, I would recommend the services of Author Assists. The company provides fast and affordable editing services. You can contact the live chat support and complete the formalities. On top of that, they also offer a great discount to first-time customers.

This is a hard question for me to answer, because I myself offer proofreading and copyediting services. You can go to Goodreads.com, or look up sites online. I advertise on Goodreads.com, and on Facebook. I do it part-time to augment my full-time job as a litigation paralegal.I read for beginning as well as accomplished authors, I keep my fees low, because I believe that no manuscript should go to the publisher unedited.
